(1991) }} "'''You're the One'''" is a song written and recorded by [[country music]] artist [[Dwight Yoakam]]. It is the second single released from his 1990 album ''[[If There Was a Way]]''. It peaked at #5 in the United States,{{cite book |title= The Billboard Book Of Top 40 Country Hits: 1944-2006, Second edition|last=Whitburn |first=Joel |authorlink=Joel Whitburn |year=2004 |publisher=Record Research |page=404}} and #4 in Canada. ==Content== The song's narrator describes about how his former lover treated him, and now she's been treated the same way that she treated him. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Jim Gable. ==Demo version== Yoakam initially recorded a demo of the song in [[1981]]. It is included on both the 2002 [[boxed set]] ''Reprise Please, Baby'', and the 2006 reissue of his debut album, ''[[Guitars, Cadillacs, Etc., Etc.]]'' ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1991) !align="center"|Peak
